CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1956, pg. A33, reads: " Freshmen 'Sweetheart' - The Freshman Club held its 'Sweetheart Ball' at Gateway Plaza last Friday evening. 'Bill' Powell of radio Station WILY, crowned the 'Sweetheart.' Pictured from left to right are 'Bill' Powell, Stanley Bethel, Marie Stotts, 'Sweetheart'; Phyllis Edwards and Ethel Robinson.  Marie also received a gift certificate. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: WILY disc jockey Bill Powell holding flowers, with Stanley Bethel, newly crowned Freshman Club "Sweetheart" Marie Stotts, Phyllis Edwards, and Ethel Robinson, standing in front of band in Gateway Plaza
